attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop government and local agencies using none-geographical numbers i.e. 0845.  These numbers are expensive to the very poor and not included in exclusive minutes for all mobile and landline providers.  If 01 or 02 numbers were used then these calls would be cheaper if not free for many mobile phone and landline users.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/saynoto08/

Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
